metadata.description: Paddock-specific planting dates for annual forage rotation system
metadata.note: This tracks when cool-season and warm-season mixes were planted in each paddock

2025.notes: Typical seeding date, good establishment before drought

2026.species: Sorghum-sudan + pearl millet + cowpeas + summer clover
2026.notes: Not yet planted - planning for early June

ccw.name: Cedar Crest West
ccw.characteristics: Silvopasture, tree cover, better moisture retention

2025.notes: Same as CCE, tree cover helped during drought

2026.species: Sorghum-sudan + pearl millet + cowpeas + summer clover
2026.notes: May plant earlier if soil temps warm under tree canopy

2025.notes: Flood plain provided good establishment conditions

2026.species: Sorghum-sudan + pearl millet + cowpeas + summer clover
2026.notes: May increase seeding rate due to larger acreage and high productivity

2025.notes: Creek moisture helped establishment even during drought

2026.species: Sorghum-sudan + pearl millet + cowpeas + summer clover
2026.notes: Small paddock, may experiment with higher cowpea ratio for nitrogen

south.name: Frankie's Pasture
south.characteristics: Creek runoff, good moisture, named after cattle

2025.notes: Uncertain date — may have been seeded in November while lingering summer grasses were still present. Previous estimates ranged Dec 12-25 but owner recalls November. Green shoots near creek by late Jan despite drought.

2026.species: Sorghum-sudan + pearl millet + cowpeas + summer clover
2026.notes: May benefit from earlier planting if cool-season mix fails to establish well

cool_season_blend.name: Winter Grazing Mix

estimated_composition.note: May include daikon radish, other brassicas

cool_season_blend.seeding_window: Late October - November (optimal), can seed through December if needed
cool_season_blend.days_to_grazing_note: Under normal moisture. Drought can delay 2-4 weeks or more.
cool_season_blend.termination: Heat death in May-June when temps exceed 85°F sustained

warm_season_blend.name: Summer Annual Mix
warm_season_blend.termination: Frost kill in October-November when temps drop below 32°F

grazing_history.note: Track when each paddock was grazed to inform planting timing

2025-2026.notes: Seeded immediately after herd moved off
Green shoots interspersed, mostly brown. Hay bale + cattle cubes provided.

cool_season_2026.strategy: Seed ALL paddocks by early November to avoid late-season drought vulnerability
cool_season_2026.lessons_learned: Dec 25 seeding (Frankie's) was too late and coincided with drought onset. Earlier seeding = better establishment before winter stress.

warm_season_2026.strategy: Stagger plantings by 1-2 weeks to spread out grazing windows and labor
warm_season_2026.experimental: Consider interseeding summer mix into cool-season stands in late April (no-till drill) to reduce transition gap
